attributes.action: supply the necessary resources and intelligence needed to help find Madeleine McCann
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe I speak for our nation when I say that the people of Britain want  to help find Madeleine McCann & bring her safely home. Not only is she a little girl, she is a British citizen and as such deserves our every effort in finding her. I petition the Prime Minister to send EVERY available intelligence & resource to assist in the search, and use every contact, of which he has many, to get Madeleine back. Thank you, PLS FORWARD TO ALL YOUR CONTACTS.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "supply the necessary resources and intelligence needed to help find Madeleine McCann."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13051.asp

Prime Minister's Office
